update t_order_payments
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cur_money = #{curMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_payed = #{tPayed,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_bn = #{paymentBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paycost = #{paycost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_app_id = #{payAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_ver = #{payVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_confirm = #{tConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t_begin = #{tBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
return_url = #{returnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merge_payment_id = #{mergePaymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order_payments set money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cur_money = #{curMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_name = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_payed = #{tPayed,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_bn = #{paymentBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paycost = #{paycost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_app_id = #{payAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_ver = #{payVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_confirm = #{tConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t_begin = #{tBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_url = #{returnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merge_payment_id = #{mergePaymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t_order_payments.payment_id, t_order_payments.money, t_order_payments.cur_money, t_order_payments.status, t_order_payments.pay_name, t_order_payments.pay_type, t_order_payments.t_payed, t_order_payments.op_id, t_order_payments.payment_bn, t_order_payments.account, t_order_payments.bank, t_order_payments.pay_account, t_order_payments.currency, t_order_payments.paycost, t_order_payments.pay_app_id, t_order_payments.pay_ver, t_order_payments.ip, t_order_payments.t_confirm, t_order_payments.t_begin, t_order_payments.memo, t_order_payments.return_url, t_order_payments.disabled, t_order_payments.trade_no, t_order_payments.merge_payment_id FROM t_order_bills JOIN t_order_payments ON t_order_payments.payment_id = t_order_bills.payment_id where t_order_bills.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
